subject: Lockouts
Basketball
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: After 23 hours of talks over two days, the N.B.A. delivered a revised offer to the players union. If the players approve the offer, a 72-game season would commence in mid-December.
snippet: After 23 hours of talks over two days, the N.B.A. delivered a revised offer to the players union. If the players approve the offer, a 72-game season would commence in mid-December.
